title: S2 Ep16: Does workfare work?
itunes:title: Does workfare work?
description: How much do we know about what workfare programs achieve for people who take part? An analysis of one program in Côte d’Ivoire fills in some of the gaps in our knowledge, Patrick Premand tells Tim Phillips.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
